quote: It is easier for a father to have children than for children to have a real father.
name: Pope John XXIII

quote: When one has not had a good father, one must create one.

quote: My father? I never knew him. Never even seen a picture of him.

quote: I am not ashamed to say that no man I ever met was my father's equal, and I never loved any other man as much.

quote: Whoever does not have a good father should procure one.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I made a decision when my father passed away that I was going to be who God made me to be and not try to preach like my father.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: I stopped loving my father a long time ago. What remained was the slavery to a pattern.
name: Anais Nin

quote: I just wish I could understand my father.
name: Michael Jackson

quote: I know that I will never find my father in any other man who comes into my life, because it is a void in my life that can only be filled by him.

quote: Sons have always a rebellious wish to be disillusioned by that which charmed their fathers.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: The place of the father in the modern suburban family is a very small one, particularly if he plays golf.

quote: My father was my teacher. But most importantly he was a great dad.

quote: The fundamental defect of fathers, in our competitive society, is that they want their children to be a credit to them.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: I have never been a material girl. My father always told me never to love anything that cannot love you back.

quote: Babies don't need fathers, but mothers do. Someone who is taking care of a baby needs to be taken care of.

quote: A father is a man who expects his son to be as good a man as he meant to be.
name: Frank A. Clark

quote: All the learnin' my father paid for was a bit o' birch at one end and an alphabet at the other.

quote: Undeservedly you will atone for the sins of your fathers.
name: Horace

quote: I pressed my father's hand and told him I would protect his grave with my life. My father smiled and passed away to the spirit land.

quote: A father is always making his baby into a little woman. And when she is a woman he turns her back again.

quote: It is much easier to become a father than to be one.
name: Kent Nerburn

quote: There's sometimes a weird benefit to having an alcoholic, violent father. He really motivated me in that I never wanted to be anything like him.

quote: My father was not a failure. After all, he was the father of a president of the United States.
name: Harry S. Truman

quote: I hope I am remembered by my children as a good father.
name: Orson Scott Card

quote: The child is father of the man.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: My father... had sharper eyes than the rest of our people.
name: Chief Joseph

quote: Being a father, being a friend, those are the things that make me feel successful.
name: William Hurt

quote: Dad was the only adult male I ever trusted.
name: Michael Reagan

quote: An angry father is most cruel towards himself.

quote: There is too much fathering going on just now and there is no doubt about it fathers are depressing.

quote: The time not to become a father is eighteen years before a war.
name: E. B. White

quote: My father taught me that the only way you can make good at anything is to practice, and then practice some more.
name: Pete Rose

quote: When I was 18, I thought my father was pretty dumb. After a while when I got to be 21, I was amazed to find out how much he'd learned in three years.

quote: I kept my babies fed. I could have dumped them, but I didn't. I decided that whatever trip I was on, they were going with me. You're looking at a real daddy.
name: Barry White

quote: Whenever I fail as a father or husband... a toy and a diamond always works.
name: Shahrukh Khan

quote: Humor is always based on a modicum of truth. Have you ever heard a joke about a father-in-law?
name: Dick Clark

quote: It is impossible to please all the world and one's father.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: A dramatic thing, the first time you stand up to your dad.
name: Lenny Kravitz

quote: A father's disappointment can be a very powerful tool.
name: Michael Bergin

quote: It was my father who taught me to value myself. He told me that I was uncommonly beautiful and that I was the most precious thing in his life.

quote: But the love of adventure was in father's blood.
name: Buffalo Bill

quote: I'm a father. It isn't just my life any more. I don't want my kid finding bottles in the house or seeing his father completely smashed.

quote: My father never raised his hand to any one of his children, except in self-defense.

quote: I never had a speech from my father 'this is what you must do or shouldn't do' but I just learned to be led by example. My father wasn't perfect.

quote: I wanted to take up music, so my father bought me a blunt instrument. He told me to knock myself out.

quote: My father wouldn't get us a TV, he wouldn't allow a TV in the house.

quote: I inherited that calm from my father, who was a farmer. You sow, you wait for good or bad weather, you harvest, but working is something you always need to do.

quote: The most important influence in my childhood was my father.
name: DeForest Kelley

quote: My father was grounded, a very meat-and-potatoes man. He was a baker.
name: Anthony Hopkins

quote: My father-in-law gets up at 5 o'clock in the morning and watches the Discovery Channel. I don't know why there's this big rush to do this.

quote: Feels good to try, but playing a father, I'm getting a little older. I see now that I'm taking it more serious and I do want that lifestyle.
name: Adam Sandler

quote: I'm more comfortable with whatever's wrong with me than my father was whenever he felt he failed or didn't measure up to the standard he set.

quote: I wasn't anything special as a father. But I loved them and they knew it.

quote: Watching your husband become a father is really sexy and wonderful.
name: Cindy Crawford

quote: Father or stepfather - those are just titles to me. They don't mean anything.

quote: If my father had hugged me even once, I'd be an accountant right now.
name: Ray Romano

quote: What harsh judges fathers are to all young men!

quote: My father, he was like the rock, the guy you went to with every problem.
name: Gwyneth Paltrow

quote: My father wants me to be like my brother, but I can't be.

quote: I would never have done what I'd done if I'd considered my father as somebody I wanted to please.

quote: Nobody ever asks a father how he manages to combine marriage and a career.

quote: Father told me that if I ever met a lady in a dress like yours, I must look her straight in the eyes.

quote: My father was the guy on the block who said hi to everyone.
name: Damon Wayans

quote: My grandfather, along with Carnegie, was a pioneer in philanthropy, which my father then practiced on a very large scale.
name: David Rockefeller

quote: I love the comic opportunities that come up in the context of a father-son relationship.

quote: I wanted to be a forest ranger or a coal man. At a very early age, I knew I didn't want to do what my dad did, which was work in an office.
name: Harrison Ford

quote: That is the thankless position of the father in the family - the provider for all, and the enemy of all.

quote: As Daddy said, life is 95 percent anticipation.
name: Gloria Swanson

quote: I was raised by free-spirited people, though my father gave me a very strong work ethic.
name: Diane Lane

quote: As a little girl I used to daydream about my real father coming on a white horse to rescue me.
name: Christine Keeler

quote: Do you know that other than my father, I've never had a man take care of me?
name: Dionne Warwick

quote: Employee fathers need to step up to the plate and put their family needs on the table.
name: James Levine

quote: I love my dad, although I'm definitely critical of him sometimes, like when his pants are too tight. But I love him so much and I try to be really supportive of him.
name: Liv Tyler

quote: Child-rearing is my main interest now. I'm a hands-on father.
name: Sean Penn

quote: Because of my father, we are that Shining City on a Hill.
name: Michael Reagan

quote: No, I never thought about my father's money as my money.
name: Christie Hefner

quote: But I have to be careful not to let the world dazzle me so much that I forget that I'm a husband and a father.

quote: I have always thought of Walt Disney as my second father.
name: Annette Funicello

quote: My father was never anti-anything in our house.

quote: Aeneas carried his aged father on his back from the ruins of Troy and so do we all, whether we like it or not, perhaps even if we have never known them.

quote: One of my earliest memories is of my father carrying me in one arm with a picket sign in the other.
name: Camryn Manheim

quote: My father loved people, children and pets.
name: Tony Visconti

quote: My father was the most rational and the most dispassionate of men.
name: Simon Newcomb

quote: I grew up not liking my father very much. I never saw him cry. But he must have. Everybody cries.

quote: My father taught me how to substitute realities.
name: Mira Sorvino

quote: My father and I have a very good relationship. We always got along. But I always scold him.

quote: My dad taught me true words you have to use in every relationship. Yes, baby.
name: Star Jones

quote: I'm a fun father, but not a good father. The hard decisions always went to my wife.
name: John Lithgow

quote: Thirteen, 13 children, and I love - I love them all. And I think I've been a good father to all of them.

quote: I was punished for blowing the whistle on my father's lifestyle.
name: Tatum O'Neal

quote: Fathers in today's modern families can be so many things.
name: Oliver Hudson

quote: My father invented a cure for which there was no disease and unfortunately my mother caught it and died of it.

quote: So my father was a person who never lied to me. If I had a question, he answered it. I knew a lot of things at a young age because I was intrigued.

quote: My father was something of a rainbow-chaser.
name: Marc Davis

quote: My father was always telling himself no one was perfect, not even my mother.

quote: The best money advice ever given me was from my father. When I was a little girl, he told me, 'Don't spend anything unless you have to.'

quote: My father was an Episcopalian minister, and I've always been comforted by the power of prayer.
name: Anna Lee

quote: When I was a kid, I used to imagine animals running under my bed. I told my dad, and he solved the problem quickly. He cut the legs off the bed.

quote: My dad always said, 'Don't worry what people think, because you can't change it.'

quote: Rich men's sons are seldom rich men's fathers.

quote: No man is responsible for his father. That was entirely his mother's affair.

quote: My brother Bob doesn't want to be in government - he promised Dad he'd go straight.

quote: Dad, wherever you are, you are gone but you will never be forgotten.

quote: Dad almost died of a heart attack in the middle of making Apocalypse Now, the biggest movie of his life. It doesn't make you want to jump into that business.

quote: Dad kept us out of school, but school comes and goes. Family is forever.

quote: What is a normal childhood? We weren't rich, we were pretty middle-class. My dad survived from job to job with him taking care of so many relatives, he couldn't save any money.

quote: Dad needs to show an incredible amount of respect and humor and friendship toward his mate so the kids understand their parents are sexy, they're fun, they do things together, they're best friends. Kids learn by example. If I respect Mom, they're going to respect Mom.

quote: I like to think my dad was easygoing and kind, and I think some of those things have been passed down. I am like him in a sense of being positive and hopeful. He was compassionate, and I've got a lot of that in me as well.

quote: Mom and Dad were married 64 years. And if you wondered what their secret was, you could have asked the local florist - because every day Dad gave Mom a rose, which he put on her bedside table. That's how she found out what happened on the day my father died - she went looking for him because that morning, there was no rose.

quote: My mom and dad gave their kids the greatest gift of all - the gift of unconditional love. They cared deeply about who we would be, and much less about what we would do.
name: Mitt Romney

quote: My dad had a church of 90 people when I was born. It was just, over the years it continued to grow.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: I didn't try to copy my dad or fit into the pressure or the mold that everybody tried to make me fit into.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: I was built up from my dad more than anyone else.

quote: I'm not sure what the future holds but I do know that I'm going to be positive and not wake up feeling desperate. As my dad said 'Nic, it is what it is, it's not what it should have been, not what it could have been, it is what it is.'

quote: I've told Billy if I ever caught him cheating, I wouldn't kill him because I love his children and they need a dad. But I would beat him up. I know where all of his sports injuries are.

quote: My dad had been born in Mexico and his family had to leave during the Mexican revolution.

quote: You know, my dad served in the President's Cabinet after his time as a governor. He told me he enjoyed being governor a lot more. Now, I understand why. If I do my job well, I can make a difference in people's lives and I can help our children realize their dreams.

quote: When my mom ran for the Senate, my dad was there for her every step of the way. I can still hear her saying in her beautiful voice, 'Why should women have any less say than men, about the great decisions facing our nation?'

quote: Me and my dad are the biggest promoters of an estate tax in the US. It's not a popular position.

quote: And my dad, you're a great actor but you're a better father.

quote: I've got high standards when it comes to boys. As my dad says, all girls should! I'm from the South - Tennessee, to be exact - and down there, we're all about southern hospitality. I know that if I like a guy, he better be nice, and above all, my dad has to approve of him!

quote: Don't forget Mother's Day. Or as they call it in Beverly Hills, Dad's Third Wife Day.

quote: My father used to play with my brother and me in the yard. Mother would come out and say, 'You're tearing up the grass' 'We're not raising grass,' Dad would reply. 'We're raising boys.'

quote: When I was about 12 years old back in Houston, my Dad used to take us to the driving range.

quote: I think a dad has to make his daughter feel that he's genuinely interested in what she's going through.

quote: Apparently, one in five people in the world are Chinese. And there are five people in my family, so it must be one of them. It's either my mum or my dad. Or my older brother, Colin. Or my younger brother, Ho-Chan-Chu. But I think it's Colin.

quote: Don't force your kids into sports. I never was. To this day, my dad has never asked me to go play golf. I ask him. It's the child's desire to play that matters, not the parent's desire to have the child play. Fun. Keep it fun.

quote: It was my 16th birthday - my mom and dad gave me my Goya classical guitar that day. I sat down, wrote this song, and I just knew that that was the only thing I could ever really do - write songs and sing them to people.

quote: One of the greatest titles in the world is parent, and one of the biggest blessings in the world is to have parents to call mom and dad.

quote: My dad was my best friend and greatest role model. He was an amazing dad, coach, mentor, soldier, husband and friend.

quote: My dad used to say, 'You wouldn't worry so much about what people thought about you if you knew how seldom they did.

quote: Dad taught me everything I know. Unfortunately, he didn't teach me everything he knows.

quote: All that really matters is I have two beautiful kids, and I'm trying to be the best dad I can possibly be, and that's the most important thing of all.
name: Tiger Woods

quote: I started out mopping floors, waiting tables, and tending bar at my dad's tavern. I put myself through school working odd jobs and night shifts. name: John Boehner

quote: I always wanted what Mom and Dad had.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: My dad is still Christian Scientist. My mom's not, and I'm not. But I believe in God, and that there's a higher power and an intelligence that's bigger than us and that we can rely on. It's not just us, thinking we are the ones in control of everything. That idea gives me support.

quote: Fortunately, as it pertains to guns, my dad and uncle introduced me to guns the way it needs to be done: smart, slow and safe.
name: Ted Nugent

quote: My dad raised me with some good advice: 'Always tell the truth. Always shoot from the hip. You might not have many friends, but you'll never have enemies, because people will always know where you're coming from.'

quote: My dad is a motorcycle guy, not some Hollywood dude.
name: Shia LaBeouf

quote: I feel lazy when I'm not working. I learned all my business sense from my dad. He always believed in me, and I think the last thing he said to me before he passed away was, 'I know you're gonna be OK. I'm not worried about you'.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: My dad loves what I do and I support my parents financially because they didn't have a job that gave them a pension.
name: Marilyn Manson

quote: My dad, bless him, was a musician. And his dad had thought that his music was rubbish.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: I'm a pretty hands-on dad and make the most of my custody. I take care of my little one whenever I can, and she determines what I can do and where I can do it.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: And my dad drilled it in my head, you know, 'If you want it bad enough, and you're willing to make the sacrifices, you can do it. But first you have to believe in yourself.

quote: But there's no substitute for a full-time dad. Dads who are fully engaged with their kids overwhelmingly tend to produce children who believe in themselves and live full lives.
name: Tony Dungy

quote: I think I've got my business notions and my sense for that sort of thing from my dad. My dad never had a chance to go to school. He couldn't read and write. But he was so smart. He was just one of those people that could just make the most of anything and everything that he had to work with.

quote: When I was younger, my family would go camping and fishing on our ranches. My dad loves being around all kinds of animals. He's the one who got me to be a really big animal lover.
name: Paris Hilton

quote: Where I come from, you don't really talk about how much you're earning. Those things are private. My dad never told my mum how much he was earning. I'm certainly not going to tell the world. I'm doing well.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: My dad was a particularly polite kind of guy, very courteous.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: Looking back, I think I was always musical. My dad was very musical, and I think my mom was musical.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: I'm very at ease, and I like it. I never thought I would be such a family-oriented guy I didn't think that was part of my makeup. But somebody said that as you get older you become the person you always should have been, and I feel that's happening to me. I'm rather surprised at who I am, because I'm actually like my dad!
name: David Bowie

quote: I get that same queasy, nervous, thrilling feeling every time I go to work. That's never worn off since I was 12 years-old with my dad's 8-millimeter movie camera.
name: Steven Spielberg

quote: My dad took me to my first movie.
name: Steven Spielberg

quote: And I saw the sax line-up that he had behind him and I thought, I'm going to learn the saxophone. When I grow up, I'm going to play in his band. So I sort of persuaded my dad to get me a kind of a plastic saxophone on the hire purchase plan.
name: David Bowie

quote: I love being a dad. I just love it.
name: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: My dad was the town drunk. Most of the time that's not so bad but New York City?
name: Henny Youngman

quote: I wanted to be a skinny little ballerina but I was a voluptuous little Italian girl whose dad had meatballs on the table every night.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: My dad became a soap opera actor, and I was an extra in a skating rink scene on the soap. I didn't audition. It was nepotism all the way.
name: Jennifer Aniston

quote: My dad was good with actions.
name: William Shatner

quote: My dad died of a stroke.
name: William Shatner

quote: There is nothing that would upset me more than my dad being bribed by the press. It's like, 'Just let them run it, then. Don't you give them ammunition.'
name: Adele

quote: I have never been jealous. Not even when my dad finished fifth grade a year before I did.
name: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: I asked my daughter when she was 16, What's the buzz on the street with the kids? She's going, to be honest, Dad, most of my friends aren't into Kiss. But they've all been told that it's the greatest show on Earth.

quote: I'm a dad, I'm a husband, I'm an activist, I'm a writer and I'm just a student of the world.
name: Michael J. Fox

quote: My Dad, a small-town lawyer, was also named Paul. Until we lost him when I was 16, he was a gentle presence in my life. I like to think he'd be proud of me and my sister and brothers, because I'm sure proud of him and of where I come from, Janesville, Wisconsin.
name: Paul Ryan

quote: Mom was 50 when my Dad died. She got on a bus every weekday for years, and rode 40 miles each morning to Madison. She earned a new degree and learned new skills to start her small business. It wasn't just a new livelihood. It was a new life.
name: Paul Ryan

quote: My mother raised three children on her own and my dad was a doctor working 16 hours a day.
name: Christopher Meloni

quote: Studies show that children best flourish when one mom and one dad are there to raise them.
name: John Boehner

quote: As my dad said, you have an obligation to leave the world better than how you found it. And he also reminded us to be givers in this life, and not takers.
name: Phil Crane

quote: You see another side of Draco when he's with his dad. When Draco is with his dad, he doesn't say anything. He keeps his mouth shut. He's sort of bullied by his dad, so he acts very different.

quote: I mean, I look at my dad. He was twenty when he started having a family, and he was always the coolest dad. He did everything for his kids, and he never made us feel like he was pressured. I know that it must be a great feeling to be a guy like that.

quote: I was in the bath at the time, and my dad came running in and said, 'Guess who they want to play Harry Potter!?' and I started to cry. It was probably the best moment of my life.

quote: Working with my dad was such a gas. We approached the work in a similar way. We only made two films together when I was an adult, Tucker, and Blown Away, but it was so much fun to play with your parent like that.
name: Jeff Bridges

quote: For me, growing up, the downside of it was that as a kid you don't want to stand out. You don't want to have a famous father let alone get a job because of your famous father, you know? But I'm a product of nepotism. That's how I got my foot in the door, through my dad.
name: Jeff Bridges

quote: Great dad. Yeah, he would ask me for money on birthdays and, you know, inappropriate times. And I just wrote him off like, 'You're not a father.' I just learned you cannot emotionally invest in people who are not attainable.
name: Drew Barrymore

quote: Now I meditate twice a day for half an hour. In meditation, I can let go of everything. I'm not Hugh Jackman. I'm not a dad. I'm not a husband. I'm just dipping into that powerful source that creates everything. I take a little bath in it.
name: Hugh Jackman

quote: One afternoon when I was 9, my dad told me I'd be skipping school the next day. Then we drove 12 hours from Melbourne to Sydney for the Centenary Test, a once-in-a-lifetime commemorative cricket match. It was great fun - especially for a kid who was a massive sports fan.
name: Hugh Jackman

quote: I don't know, I just want to be happy. I could be in a hole somewhere. Or I could completely lose it and be some hippy living in the woods with my dad.
name: Shia LaBeouf

quote: I didn't know my dad for a long time. My dad was on drugs and my dad was at the VA Hospital, my dad was off in his own world selling drugs or using them or there would be crack heads in the house or whatever it would be.
name: Shia LaBeouf

quote: My parents were working class folks. My dad was a bartender for most of his life, my mom was a maid and a cashier and a stock clerk at WalMart. We were not people of financial means in terms of significant financial means. I always told them, 'I didn't always have what I wanted. I always had what I needed.' My parents always provided that.
name: Marco Rubio

quote: My dad was a bartender. My mom was a cashier, a maid and a stock clerk at K-Mart. They never made it big. They were never rich. And yet they were successful. Because just a few decades removed from hopelessness, they made possible for us all the things that had been impossible for them.
name: Marco Rubio

quote: Without my dad, I wouldn't be here.
name: Maria Sharapova

quote: My dad played fiddle as well.
name: Robert Plant

quote: I want to be a young dad. By 25 or 26 I want to see myself, like, married or start looking for a family.
name: Justin Bieber

quote: When I was younger, I had a perm, and it was really big. My mom was a hairdresser, so even my dad had a perm! I looked like a poodle, but it was cool at the time.
name: Heidi Klum

quote: My friends say, 'Man you're going to have kids sleeping on pillowcases with your face on it! You're going to be on toothbrushes and magnets and stuff.' I guess now that I'm a dad, I'm thrilled about that.
name: Hugh Jackman

quote: My kids are not that interested in my movie career, by the way. My son, in particular, never talks about it. He just wants me as his dad.
name: Hugh Jackman

quote: I've never heard my dad say a bad word about anybody. He always keeps his emotions in check and is a true gentleman. I was taught that losing it was indulgent, a selfish act.
name: Hugh Jackman

quote: Now my dad is with me, traveling with me and a big part of this whole thing is I like to mix it up a little bit, you know. Who gets to take their father on a private jet across the country and stay in first class hotels? So we're enjoying it, but I'd stop if it's not possible.
name: Shia LaBeouf

quote: My dad used to say, 'Just because you dress up in a coat and tie, it doesn't influence your intelligence.'
name: Tiger Woods

quote: My Dad used to tell us: 'En este pais, ustedes van a poder lograr todas las cosas que nosotros no pudimos' 'In this country, you will be able to accomplish all the things we never could.'
name: Marco Rubio

quote: My dad, he is such a soft man. Even if he has these opinions about my boyfriends, he will be the sweetest guy. He will make you feel like you're fascinating and awesome, even if he doesn't like you that much.
name: Amanda Seyfried

quote: I'm not a religious person. My mom was of Jewish blood and my dad was Protestant.
name: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: My dad believes in God, I think. I'm not sure if my mom does. I don't.
name: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: My dad's got a brilliant eye for scripts 'cos he's a literary agent. He and my agent read a load of scripts and filter them.
name: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: Joanna points her camera at a section of society unused to having cameras pointed at it. But I don't know about categorizing them in terms of class I'm a bit wary of that. My dad is the son of a shipbuilder.

quote: It's an ongoing joy being a dad.
name: Liam Neeson

quote: My dad would give me $10, which is a lot of money when you're 9, to sing at church, on tables at restaurants, at family functions, just about anywhere.
name: Katy Perry

quote: I forgive my mom for being a psycho and my dad for being a loser.
name: Nikki Sixx

quote: It is a sad commentary of our times when our young must seek advice and counsel from 'Dear Abby' instead of going to Mom and Dad.
name: Abigail Van Buren

quote: There are absolutely no problems between me, my dad and my sister. Obviously I grew up with just my mum, but my relationship with my dad is just fine.
name: Norah Jones

quote: I try to be a hard boiled sometimes. My kids see right through it. I'm acting. It's always, 'When I say you'll be back at 11, that means 11, not 11.15. Do you hear me!?' Then, 'Yeah, Dad.'
name: Liam Neeson

quote: My grandfather and my uncle both died from colorectal cancer, my dad almost died from it and I have the gene for it.
name: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: A father and two sons run Adelphia. It's a cable company. And they took from that company a billion dollars. A billion. Three people - three people took a billion dollars. What were they gonna do, start their own space program? 'Let's send the monkey to Mars, Dad!'
name: Lewis Black

quote: One of the scary things is that, when you're a kid, you look at your dad as the man who has no fear. When you're an adult, you realize your father had fear, and that you have it, too.
name: David Duchovny

quote: I'm just a pretty regular dad.
name: Ang Lee

quote: I think my dad is a lot cooler than other dads. He still acts like he's still 17.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: My dad says I could sing before I could talk, if that's possible. I was always humming and things like that.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: I once said to my father, when I was a boy, 'Dad we need a third political party.' He said to me, 'I'll settle for a second.'
name: Ralph Nader

quote: My Dad was my biggest supporter. He never put pressure on me.
name: Bobby Orr

quote: My dad always used to tell me that if they challenge you to an after-school fight, tell them you won't wait-you can kick their ass right now.
name: Cameron Diaz

quote: I'm a dad, and I no longer see a way for my kids to even inherit the money that I'm making, let alone go out there, have an idea, and create it in their own lifetime.
name: Glenn Beck

quote: I like all the angels around because they protect me and my daughter. I mean, her Dad's an angel.
name: Courtney Love

quote: My dad never blew anything up, but he probably had friends who did. He and my mom have always preached that the pen is mightier than a Molotov cocktail.
name: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

quote: Overcoming my dad telling me that I could never amount to anything is what has made me the megalomaniac that you see today.
name: Bono

quote: Going to the theater is such a joyous experience. My dad would take my sister and me to plays when we were very young, like six or seven years old.
name: Julia Roberts

quote: My dad's a beautiful man, but like a lot of Mexican men, or men in general, a lot of men have a problem with the balance of masculinity and femininity - intuition and compassion and tenderness - and get overboard with the macho thing. It took him a while to become more, I would say, conscious, evolved.
name: Carlos Santana

quote: My Dad is my hero.
name: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: I can definitely say the older I've got the better I've become at being a dad and a husband.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: My dad always said, 'Champ, the measure of a man is not how often he is knocked down, but how quickly he gets up.'
name: Joe Biden

quote: I was a mixture of being incredibly old for my age and incredibly backwards. I was born quite old, but then I stopped growing. I lived with my mum and dad till I was 30.
name: Helena Bonham Carter

quote: I'm turning into a stricter dad.
name: David Duchovny

quote: I have four shelves covered with journals that I've written. Dad and I are writing songs together. I've probably written 100 songs.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: I probably have an earlier curfew than anyone. My mom wants to keep me really safe and my dad's not overly protective, but he's a dad no matter what.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: I don't really know any other musicians like me. I grew up backstage with my dad who played in a post-war dance band, so I always feel at home at a venue.
name: Pete Townshend

quote: I love my dad and we have a very good relationship now.
name: Norah Jones

quote: I'm the whitest guy you will ever meet. The first time I saw an African-American, my dad had to tell me to stop staring.
name: Glenn Beck

quote: When I was little, we had a Golden Book that had all these Disney characters in one portrait on the first page. My dad used to read from it every night. We'd play this game of find Pluto or find Donald Duck. He'd read us stories and do all the voices. Those are great memories.
name: Danica McKellar

quote: Most children - I know I did when I was a kid - fantasize another set of parents. Or fantasize no parents. They don't tell their real parents about that - you don't want to tell Mom and Dad. Kids lead a very private life. And I was a typical child, I think. I was a liar.
name: Maurice Sendak

quote: Most children - I know I did when I was a kid - fantasize another set of parents. Or fantasize no parents. They don't tell their real parents about that - you don't want to tell Mom and Dad.
name: Maurice Sendak

quote: My Dad is my hero. He's 85 now and he is in great health. He is handsome and strong. He has an incredible moral and ethical backbone. I couldn't have been luckier with my parents.
name: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: My dad was the district attorney of New Orleans for about 30 years. And when he opened his campaign headquarters back in the early '70s, when I was 5 years old, my mother wanted me to play the national anthem. And they got an upright piano on the back of a flatbed truck and I played it.
name: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: My dad and mom believed that you do what you have to do in private and don't make a big deal out of it. Just try to help people as much as you can.
name: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: Well, my dad was the district attorney of New Orleans for about 30 years.
name: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: What I do now is all my dad's fault, because he bought me a guitar as a boy, for no apparent reason.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: My dad bought me a guitar and people would ask me to play.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: I shouldn't have got married. My dad told me. I was 35 and I got married. He said, 'You're too young to be married'. 'What? I'm 35'. Said, 'You're far too young. You haven't lived yet'. He was right, bless him, thanks, Dad.

quote: My dad is a Deadhead, my mom's a Jewish-American princess from Jersey.
name: Adam Lambert

quote: My mom was a waitress, and my dad was a plumber who worked for the City of San Clemente fixing mains breaks, so not too glamorous.
name: Shaun White

quote: My dad, he's the rocker.
name: Shaun White

quote: My dad got me a huge board when I was little. He loves to surf. He suited me up and sent me out on this huge wave. I went under, and when I came out and the board hit me in the face. So I said, I never wanted to do this again. I stayed away until I was 13.
name: Shaun White

quote: We all started snowboarding in the beginning as a family just to be closer together, go on trips. It was our soccer, but instead of Dad yelling at me from the sideline he is there riding with me and hitting the jumps even before I am hitting them.
name: Shaun White

quote: From 1965 to 1967, my dad, Jack Gilligan, served in Congress and helped pass landmark laws like the Voting Rights Act.
name: Kathleen Sebelius

quote: My dad always tell me to make decisions from love and not from fear.
name: Rashida Jones

quote: My dad takes care of me as a manager and as a dad. That's his job, you know, to take care of me. He has my best interests at heart.
name: Jessica Simpson

quote: I can talk to my dad like he's my manager, and put 'Dad' on the back burner. We've been doing it since I was 13.
name: Jessica Simpson

quote: My dad's a doctor, and when I was 8, I went to one of his medical conferences where they were demonstrating laser surgery on a chicken. I was so mad that a chicken had to die, I never ate meat again.
name: Natalie Portman

quote: When I was in nursery school, the teachers asked me, y'know, 'What does your dad do for a living?' So I said 'He helps women get pregnant!' They called my mom and they were like, 'What exactly does your husband do?'
name: Natalie Portman

quote: You always hear people saying, 'I hope I'm not turning into my dad', but I'd be honoured if I became half as decent a bloke as he is.

quote: I came back from university thinking I knew all about politics and racism, not knowing my dad had been one of the youngest-serving Labour councillors in the town and had refused to work in South Africa years ago because of the situation there. And he's never mentioned it - you just find out. That's a real man to me. A sleeping lion.
name: Johnny Vegas

quote: I wanted to be a mechanic. When I was 14 I wanted to quit school and go work on my car. But my dad said Son, you shouldn't do that. You should stay in school until your education is finished, and when you're done, don't make your hobby your job.
name: Eric Bana

quote: My dad taught me from my youngest childhood memories through these connections with Aboriginal and tribal people that you must always protect people's sacred status, regardless of the pest.
name: Steve Irwin

quote: I haven't been baptised. My dad's not in the church and is not a religious person. My mum is more spiritual - she does Thai-chi and goes to Stonehenge and things like that. I'm proud to be pagan. Finland is not really a religious country. I'm still looking for my god.
name: Ville Valo

quote: My dad was a Methodist minister.
name: George McGovern

quote: The problem with me, as far as getting married and having a family, is that my comedy is so important to me. So I don't know if I'll ever be as good a dad as my dad.
name: Adam Sandler

quote: But my dad also was a remarkable man, a good person, a principled individual, a man of integrity.
name: Sidney Poitier

quote: My dad was a militant atheist, or is a militant atheist. My mum was sort of bought up in a religious family because she was a Protestant from Ireland but wasn't especially religious.
name: Tony Blair

quote: My dad had a commercial film company, so he had a videotape player before anyone. So he got Mel Brooks movies or Citizen Kane or some classic old movies. And every summer the revival house in Evanston would show the great films from the '50s and '60s and '70s.

quote: I go off and make movies I come home, and I'm a dad and I hang with my girls.
name: Clive Owen

quote: They have had such a crazy life living with me as their dad. Not crazy but different from their friends.
name: Sebastian Bach

quote: Yeah, my dad bought me a guitar when I was like 10, and I didn't really want it then.
name: Miranda Lambert

quote: I've dated all kinds of guys and didn't know who I'd end up with. But I kind of assumed it would be someone more like my dad than not.
name: Miranda Lambert

quote: My dad's whole family is in Madras and I was born in America so we didn't have that big Indian community. I don't really have anything interesting to say about it. When I talk about it people are like, 'meh, let's talk about something else.'
name: Mindy Kaling

quote: I have to remind my dad, 'Journalists - no matter how many cigars they smoke with you - are not your friends, so don't talk to them.'
name: Cameron Diaz

quote: I like to believe that I've got a lot of guardian warriors sittin' on my shoulder including my dad.
name: Patrick Swayze

quote: I used to say, 'Man, I think I'd be a really good dad. I'll be a great provider. I'm funny I'll go on trips with them - I'll do all sorts of stuff.' But the momming? I'm not made for that. I have a really good mom I know what she put into it.
name: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: My dad's probably one of the kindest people in the world. When I was younger that's not how I was- I was a little spoiled brat.
name: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: I spent a lot of time on farms when I was young. My uncle and my dad owned a big farm.
name: Emeril Lagasse

quote: I have this complex. I don't like too much exposure. I don't know why it is. Maybe it's bred in me, because my dad always told me to be humble and don't think you're too good.
name: Mark Viduka

quote: And of course I've got kids of my own now, and they love me being in the Harry Potter films. I'm now part of a phenomenon. You become incredibly cool to your kids, and you get a young fan base. So you became the cool dad at school. You're suddenly hip.
name: Gary Oldman

quote: 'Nil By Mouth' was a bit autobiographical, but as I always pointed out at the time, that's not my dad.
name: Gary Oldman

quote: I couldn't walk down any street in Britain without being laughed at. It was a nightmare. My children were devastated because their dad was a figure of ridicule.
name: David Icke

quote: I sort of always had an inkling towards some kind of an art form. I grew up in a very small town, and I just figure-skated. My dad played hockey and I was surrounded by sports, but it wasn't quite doing it for me. I wasn't totally fulfilled, and I did a lot of skating.
name: Rachel McAdams

quote: Also for me it was different because I play a lot of villains and in this one I play a dad and I play a good guy, basically. He's the Secretary of the Treasury. I never had a job like that.
name: Christopher Walken

quote: I didn't come from a trailer park. I grew up middle class and my dad had money and my mom made my lunch. I got a car when I was sixteen. I'm proud of that.
name: Kid Rock

quote: In addition, there is one title I cherish a great deal more than Congressman and that is the title of... Dad.
name: J. C. Watts

quote: My dad was the biggest influence on my life because he was never boring.
name: Christian Bale

quote: Look, I've got incredible pride for my family. I've absolutely fallen into that cliche of a dad who could just happily talk about my daughter endlessly.
name: Christian Bale

quote: I met my grandfather just before he died, and it was the first time that I had seen Dad with a relative of his. It was interesting to see my own father as a son and the body language and alteration in attitude that comes with that, and it sort of changed our relationship for the better.

quote: My family belongs to a tennis club in Valencia, California, so I always go there. I play a lot of tennis with my dad and swim. And I like to go to the gym there.
name: Ashley Tisdale

quote: My sister is totally my dad's daughter because she loves sports.
name: Ashley Tisdale

quote: Music was always the distraction, so it was the obvious choice to pursue. My dad always said to find a job I love to do, that way it wouldn't feel like a job. So I did that.
name: Jason Mraz

quote: I'll back up anything my dad says.
name: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: To be fair to my dad, he is one of the brightest men I've ever met.
name: Philip Seymour Hoffman

quote: A spirit is, like, your mother, my dad, who've made it. They can come around, but they come around in a loving way because they've already made it to God. Most people make it.

quote: I grew up in a house where my father encouraged my brother and me to fail. I specifically remember coming home and saying, 'Dad, Dad, I tried out for this or that and I was horrible,' and he would high-five me and say, 'Way to go.'

quote: My humanitarian work evolved from being with my family. My mom, my dad, they really set a great example for giving back. My mom was a nurse, my dad was a school teacher. But my mom did a lot of things for geriatrics and elderly people. She would do home visits for free.
name: Cat Cora

quote: It wasn't like I was self-motivated. My dad started me. It was his dream before it was mine.
name: Venus Williams

quote: I'm always on the court with my dad.
name: Venus Williams

quote: You get to a certain age and you can't judge yourself on your dad or your parents.
name: Ellie Goulding

quote: Not much shocked me. You know, I worked in a home for Alzheimer's patients and my dad used to be really into murders and stuff, so I saw dead bodies. It desensitised me to a lot of things.
name: Ellie Goulding

quote: The only day I remember of my parents' marriage was the day my dad walked out. As I stood there at five years old, with my older sister and younger brother, I knew that he was gone.
name: Ellie Goulding

quote: 'I Know You Care' is about my dad. And I haven't seen him for a long, long time. And my parents divorced when I was really young. And I guess I just wanted a - it was my way of saying that I wasn't bitter or angry anymore. I was just sad and just felt like something was missing.
name: Ellie Goulding

quote: My father came from a very poor background, but I was very fortunate in the sense that we were never in need. My dad was determined to make sure that we didn't want for things. He wanted to give us more opportunity than he had, a better shot at a better life.
name: Brad Pitt

quote: Since I was a boy, from this house, I was out rescuing crocodiles and snakes. My mum and dad were very passionate about that and, I was lucky enough to go along.
name: Steve Irwin

quote: My mother and dad were big animal lovers, too. I just don't know how I would have lived without animals around me. I'm fascinated by them - both domestic pets and the wild community. They just are the most interesting things in the world to me, and it's made such a difference in my lifetime.
name: Betty White

quote: During the Depression, my dad made radios to sell to make extra money. Nobody had any money to buy the radios, so he would trade them for dogs. He built kennels in the backyard, and he cared for the dogs.
name: Betty White

quote: Losing my parents was the most crushing thing that ever happened to me. I lost my dad when I was 26, and it changed my life entirely.
name: Harlan Coben

quote: My father was the quintessential husband and dad.
name: Sidney Poitier

quote: My mother taught public school, went to Harvard and then got her master's there and taught fifth and sixth grade in a public school. My dad had a more working-class lifestyle. He didn't go to college. He was an auto mechanic and a bartender and a janitor at Harvard.
name: Ben Affleck

quote: I was always a kid trying to make a buck. I borrowed a dollar from my dad, went to the penny candy store, bought a dollar's worth of candy, set up my booth, and sold candy for five cents apiece. Ate half my inventory, made $2.50, gave my dad back his dollar.
name: Guy Fieri

quote: Come Christmas Eve, we usually go to my mom and dad's. Everybody brings one gift and then we play that game when we all steal it from each other. Some are really cool, others are useful and some are a bit out there.
name: Amy Grant

quote: I was born and raised in East Los Angeles by a single mom who had three biological kids and adopted four more. I never met my dad.
name: will.i.am

quote: I didn't know my Dad - he moved out early. And my mom's politics were kind of hardscrabble. She didn't think about Democrats or Republicans. She thought about who made sense. I've been both in my life.
name: Dennis Miller

quote: My dad was a labourer and my mum had exactly the same job as Noel Gallagher's mum - she was a dinner lady at our local school. Everyone comes over from Ireland and they get the same jobs.
name: Danny Boyle

quote: I think my dad has helped me tremendously.
name: Rand Paul

quote: My dad was dean of fine arts at the university. I was casting bronzes in the school foundry. I was using the university as a playground.
name: Maya Lin

quote: My dad didn't drive - the only dad I knew who didn't.
name: Julie Burchill

quote: When I moved out of London 13 years ago, I found a whole other reason not to drive. This was because my new husband Dan, unlike my dad, did drive, and this became a great source of fun and adventure.
name: Julie Burchill

quote: And I love Mel Brooks. My Dad loved his movies, too, they're awesome, the kind of thing that if you're in for ten minutes, you're in for two hours.
name: Mike Myers

quote: One of the things I like about when I tour sometimes is that occasionally you'll see a dad there with his 12-year-old son and they're both enjoying it.
name: Tim Vine

quote: Yes, I always remember my dad's, mom's and my grandma's perfumes.
name: Marc Jacobs

quote: Becoming a dad was the proudest moment of my life. Playing football does not even compare.
name: Wayne Rooney

quote: I've never been a hands-on dad. I'm not ashamed to admit it, but you can't run a restaurant and be home for tea at 4:30 and bath and change nappies.
name: Gordon Ramsay

quote: I want my kids to see me as Dad, for God's sake, not a television personality.
name: Gordon Ramsay

quote: I was always embarrassed because my dad wore a suit and my mother wore flat pumps and a cozy jumper while my friends' parents were punks or hippies.
name: Shirley Manson

quote: You do need parental guidance and I was in a great position with both my mum and dad. They split when I was a baby but even though I stayed with my mom they were both very much involved in my upbringing.
name: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: Barack Obama knows that to create an economy built to last, we need to focus on middle-class families. Families who stay up on Sunday nights pacing the floor, like my dad did, while their children, tucked in bed, dream big dreams. Families who aren't sure what Monday morning will bring, but who believe our nation's best days are still ahead.
name: Charles Schumer

quote: I would have to say the person with whom I am most in love is definitely my son, Everly Bear. Although I'm his dad, I'm also his friend.
name: Anthony Kiedis

quote: My dad was in the army. World War II. He got his college education from the army. After World War II he became an insurance salesman. Really, I didn't know my dad very well. He and my mother split up after the war. I was raised by my maternal grandmother and grandfather, and by my mother.
name: Al Pacino

quote: My mom and dad met at Anaheim High School. After they got married, all they wanted to do was have four children, and they did.
name: Gwen Stefani

quote: But I honestly don't read critics. My dad reads absolutely everything ever written about me. He calls me up to read ecstatic reviews, but I always insist that I can't hear them. If you give value to the good reviews, you have to give value to the criticism.
name: Fiona Apple

quote: My dad was a Communist Party member who fought for his country.
name: Tim Roth

quote: Paul McCartney had a baby when he was 61 Rod Stewart was 66 Rupert Murdoch was a stunning 72. Not only does that mean they'll have less stamina than the average dad, that means they'll, well, check out a lot sooner too.
name: Jeffrey Kluger

quote: The golden child may be the oldest one, unless it's the youngest. It may be the toughest one, unless it's the most sensitive. It's not even necessary that Mom and Dad have the same favorite - and typically they don't.
name: Jeffrey Kluger

quote: My dad spent his whole life getting into fights for telling what he believed to be the truth. Basically it comes from my dad-and he's screaming right-wing, so there you are.
name: Thom Yorke

quote: When my dad divorced my mom it was kind of like him leaving me also.
name: Nicole Richie

quote: No matter how good you are, at some point your kids are gonna have to create their own independence and think that Mom and Dad aren't cool, just to establish themselves. That's what adolescence is about. They're gonna go through that no matter what.
name: Eddie Vedder

quote: I think the hardest thing about making music now is being a great dad at the same time. There's an insanity that goes with writing - a mad scientist thing that you have to go through - and sacrificing a kid's upbringing to do that is not an option.
name: Eddie Vedder

quote: My dad gave me my first bike at 16. I soon fell off and was in a wheelchair for weeks. I haven't fallen since.
name: Hugh Laurie

quote: My dad always said he couldn't remember a time when I did not want to act.
name: Gwyneth Paltrow

quote: My dad is a Jack Nicholson lookalike and a frustrated performer, my mother's into reading and poetry. I suppose the thing I owe them most is my confidence.
name: Michael Sheen

quote: I was always okay with the fact that I was taller and bigger than everybody else growing up. My mom, my dad, and my friends always told me I was beautiful.
name: Jordin Sparks

quote: If you love somebody, you love them. My parents had a 25-year age gap between them and my mum was the breadwinner, my dad the house husband. I'm a strong believer that a good relationship can work, whatever the situation.
name: Katherine Jenkins

quote: In Heaven, I believe my dad is somewhere doing something nice. I feel I've been too lucky to travel this far without somebody guiding me.
name: Katherine Jenkins

quote: I was a very sickly kid. While I was in the hospital at age 7, my Dad brought me a stack of comic books to keep me occupied. I was hooked.
name: Len Wein

quote: I've never tried to find my real parents. I'm very grateful to my mum and dad for adopting me - they're completely incredible people. It was my dad who encouraged me to question everything, to forge my own path, to think, to read. I always felt it was my right to question everything.
name: Dan Stevens

quote: My dad was a mime and then he had his company and created plays for children and was very successful with it.
name: Marion Cotillard

quote: My dad is the nicest guy you'll ever meet, and the easiest going.
name: Serena Williams

quote: My dad is a marketing mastermind.
name: Serena Williams

quote: I grew up in Chicago, so I've always been a Bears fan. Dad used to take me to Bears games and Cubs games. My brother used to ride me over to Lake Forest College on his Honda Supersport and we'd watch the Bears practice. I remember those guys out there as monsters - they were the biggest things I've ever seen!
name: Kyle Chandler

quote: When you're shooting a film, you really don't get to be a dad, and you don't really get to be a husband. You don't really exist at all. But I do drag my family with me on location whenever I can.
name: Eric Bana

quote: I have a theory that I really want my kids to know - the only coloration that they make between dad being in films and reality is just a lot of people doing a lot of hard work.
name: Eric Bana

quote: I hate being clean-shaven. My daughter gets very upset if I shave and says, 'Bring back the spikes, Dad.'
name: Eric Bana

quote: My dad was a homicide cop in the gay neighborhood in the city when gay neighborhoods were desperate, depressing, sad places run by the mob. The only gay people he'd met when I came out to him were corpses.
name: Dan Savage

quote: But while mum and dad were incredibly caring, it was also a very chaotic household where everyone fought about everything. So I know what it's like to internalize all that chaos.
name: Dave Eggers

quote: My dad was diagnosed with cancer, so we ended up burying him a year to the day that he was diagnosed.
name: Seann William Scott

quote: My role model is my dad.
name: Seann William Scott

quote: My dad liked to boil a squirrel head and suck the brains out the nose. Smaller than a chicken, bigger than a rat.
name: Beth Ditto

quote: My mother told me Homer Ditto was not my father. Nope. Mom had had a fling with some other guy who was my dad. Some dude who didn't stick around too long who Mom was happy to get rid of. She chose Homer, and Homer chose me, so he lent me his name even though I didn't have his blood.
name: Beth Ditto

quote: If my Dad doesn't like you, you will know. My Mom is just too innocent to ever lie. She doesn't even cuss.
name: Channing Tatum

quote: My father was so good-natured and had such a happy disposition. I've always confused him with Jimmy Stewart. So, think Jimmy Stewart. That's my dad.
name: Jane Pauley

quote: I am quite strict as a dad but I don't want to be censorious.
name: Nick Clegg

quote: My dad's side of the family had lots of artists and musicians. There's an emotional, quite sentimental quality to Slavic culture. It's very open, it loves art, it loves music, it loves literature. It's very warm, it's very up, it's very down. I would celebrate that.
name: Nick Clegg

quote: I say this as a young dad seeing children going into primary school: I don't think we should underestimate the formative effect on a child of those first years in primary school.
name: Nick Clegg

quote: When I was really little I would sit in the back of my dad's car when he'd be playing old-school music. He'd turn down the music and turn around and I'd be singing and know all of the words but I didn't even know how to talk. From then on I've always wanted to be a singer.
name: Leona Lewis

quote: I do love a bit of fashion. I grew up around a lot of it as my mum and dad had clothing stores so my mum was always designing a lot, and I definitely had that as an influence.
name: Leona Lewis

quote: My dad is such a good man. You know how when you are a child you think your dad is invincible? Well, I still think that - he is so wise and everything I do I ask my dad's advice about first.
name: Leona Lewis

quote: I feel like I've lived quite a sheltered life, like my mom and dad were quite protective of me.
name: Leona Lewis

quote: My dad was just a big Joseph Campbell nut.
name: Trey Parker

quote: I bought a house for my mom, I bought a house for my dad, I bought a house for my sister.
name: Trey Parker

quote: I watched Italia '90 with my Mum and Dad and my brother, you know, leaping around the house when the penalties were on... It would be great to be part of that, to have that kind of impact.
name: Steven Gerrard

quote: I'm not an American, but I have this weird connection to America in different ways through my dad living here for five years, my godfather being an American who I'm very close to.
name: Damian Lewis

quote: My dad was a baggage handler at Heathrow and careful with money. He worked hard and had three jobs when I was young. I wish I'd inherited his care for money. Sadly, I've grown up to be rather scatty when it comes to finances.
name: Gary Numan

quote: Before breaking into music, I had various jobs: forklift driver, driving a courier. But I was forced into working rather than doing it off my own bat because that was my dad's way: you got a job and paid your way.
name: Gary Numan

quote: I have one brother, John, an airline pilot, who is seven years younger. He's adopted, though we're still blood related - he's my cousin. My parents couldn't have any more children after me, so when Dad's brother died, they adopted John, then just a baby.
name: Gary Numan

quote: I met Gemma, my wife, when she was 12. She had a schoolgirl crush on me and her dad had arranged for her to meet me. Later, she started coming to my concerts, but I only got to know her well after her mother died. I rang to see how she was, and that's how it started.
name: Gary Numan

quote: My dad is like a cactus - introverted and tough. I'm a people person, like my mom, but I got my competitiveness from my dad. He came to this country from Belarus with nothing and built a real business. He's my hero for giving me that need to run a business and for having enormous confidence in me.
name: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: I'm concerned a little bit with the culture of celebrating the fundraise. My dad taught me that when you borrow money it's the worst day of your life.
name: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: You have to respect your parents. They are giving you an at-bat. If you're an entrepreneur and go into the family business, you want to grow fast. Patience is important. But respect the other party... My dad and I pulled it off because we really respect each other.
name: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: People who build family businesses are not classically trained. They have to deal with an enormous amount of politics. You think corporate politics are tough? Go work for your dad or your mom.
name: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: My parents were kind of over protective people. Me and my sister had to play in the backyard all the time. They bought us bikes for Christmas but wouldn't let us ride in the street, we had to ride in the backyard. Another Christmas, my dad got me a basketball hoop and put it in the middle of the lawn! You can't dribble on grass.
name: Jimmy Fallon

quote: My mom grew up in poverty in Oklahoma - like Dust Bowl, nine people in one room kind of place - and the way she got out of poverty was through education. My dad grew up without a dad, with very little and he also made his way out through education.
name: Jennifer Garner

quote: I am lucky to have had an attentive, curious and loving dad and heart-smart, down-to-earth, gifted mother. They changed the outlooks of their own lives and have never forgotten the people and organizations that helped them dream bigger than their circumstances should have allowed.
name: Jennifer Garner

quote: My dad and my uncles owned a bar outside of Cincinnati. I worked there growing up, mopping floors, waiting tables.
name: John Boehner

quote: My hat was pulled down and this girl said 'Are you really him?' I whispered 'Yeah, I'm really him.' She screamed, 'Mom! Dad! It's Heath Ledger!
name: Josh Hartnett

quote: My dad works in child protection and he's spent many, many years in that line of work.
name: Chris Hemsworth

quote: At one point my dad called me and said, 'You have always been a great salesman. I think it's time you come home and sell swimming pools.'
name: Courteney Cox

quote: You know, my mother's beautiful, my dad was a really handsome man, and there was a lot of talk about looks when I was growing up.
name: Courteney Cox

quote: I mean, my dad's a television producer, and I knew I could get a job as an assistant or a reader with one of his friends, but it wasn't exactly what I wanted to do.
name: J. J. Abrams

quote: My dad had this philosophy that if you tell children they're beautiful and wonderful then they believe it, and they will be. So I never thought I was unattractive. But I was never one of the girls at school who had lots of boyfriends.
name: Emily Mortimer

quote: It's a complex relationship when your dad happened to be president and you are president and then you have all the amateur psychology that goes on when people try to speculate about motivations.
name: Jeb Bush

quote: My guess is my brother would call his mom and his dad pretty regularly, a lot more than I probably did.
name: Jeb Bush

quote: I'm lucky because my dad taught me to be frugal and save. And that's important because I want to know that I don't have to take an acting job for two or three years if I don't want to and that I'll still be able to make my house and car payments and buy food for my dogs.
name: Ashley Greene

quote: My mom and dad just loved the fact that I fooled around. They just embraced it. They'd always kind of enjoy it, and they liked it when I made them laugh.
name: Dominic Monaghan

quote: Often as a child you see someone with a learning disability or Down's Syndrome and my mum and dad were always very quick to explain exactly what was going on and to be in their own way inclusive and welcoming.
name: Christopher Eccleston

quote: When I started writing, I did have some idealised notion of my dad as a writer. But I have less and less of a literary rivalry with him as I've gone on. I certainly don't feel I need his approval, although maybe that's because I'm confident that I've got it.
name: Paul Theroux

quote: It was, you know, probably 80 degrees out in L.A., and my dad took me outside and there was snow. At the time, I thought, 'Every kid doesn't have snow in their backyard on Christmas?'
name: Tori Spelling

quote: I'd like to play Matt Damon's daddy. He's a wonderful actor, I really admire him, and I'd like to play his dad one day.
name: Larry Hagman

quote: The one thing that kept our family together was the music. The only thing that our family would share emotionally was to have our dad cry over something the kids did with music.
name: Dennis Wilson

quote: I am the granddaughter of a Welsh coal miner who was determined that his kids get out of the mines. My dad got his first job when he was six years old, in a little village in Wales called Nantyffyllon, cleaning bottles at the Colliers Arms.
name: Ann Romney

quote: It's just really making sure I am doing the best job I can do as a dad. I do think that is my No. 1 job.
name: Tony Dungy

quote: My dad read the Bible ten times, and I want to do it in my lifetime. But it's definitely tough getting through.
name: Pamela Anderson

quote: My Dad was from Liverpool, and he picked it up in the army. He'd often come out with this stuff.
name: Mike Myers

quote: My dad loved to laugh. He was very funny and very silly.
name: Mike Myers

quote: My dad sold encyclopedias and my mom worked in a factory office.
name: Mike Myers

quote: My mother always taught me, even my dad, just never let other people's opinions of you shape your opinion of yourself. And I never have and I never will.
name: Ruben Studdard

quote: I loved climbing because of the freedom, and having time and space. I remember coming off Everest for the last time, thinking of Dad and wishing that he could have seen what I saw. He would have loved it.
name: Bear Grylls

quote: Becoming a dad means you have to be a role model for your son and be someone he can look up to.
name: Wayne Rooney

quote: I was lucky to have my dad in my life. As crazy as things got, I always had him to put his hand on my shoulder.
name: Sharon Stone

quote: Within our culture, every school has a swimming pool. We lived on the coast. People swam in the surf. It's a very sporty nation and at that particular time anyone who had an artistic bent was very much an outsider. So if you liked reading or ideas or playing the piano then your dad viewed you as a sissy, basically.
name: Geoffrey Rush

quote: My dad always taught me to never be satisfied, to want more and know that what is done is done.
name: Thierry Henry

quote: So much of my aesthetic was formed by my dad.
name: Ron Perlman

quote: My dad wanted to name me after Rainier Maria Rilke, the poet.
name: Rainn Wilson

quote: My dad was always such a frustrated artist. He always worked very hard to support his family, doing a bunch of ridiculous jobs. He wanted to be a painter, but then he also wrote science-fiction novels in his spare time.
name: Rainn Wilson

quote: The founder of the Mona Foundation actually knew my dad for years, and the more I learned about it, the more I realized I really found the perfect charity. It sponsors schools and educational initiatives all over the planet.
name: Rainn Wilson

quote: I had bohemian parents in Seattle in the last '60s living in a houseboat. My dad wrote science fiction novels and painted big murals and oil paintings.
name: Rainn Wilson

quote: As a father now, I wouldn't do what my dad did, because it left me feeling emotionally unstable as a kid. But he didn't do the things he did out of selfishness or malice.
name: Anthony Kiedis

quote: I know my dad is a big Internet freak, and he's been known to be a Wikileaker.
name: Anthony Kiedis

quote: In a school where everyone is famous or rich or whatever, you have a culture, 'What does your dad do?' 'What does your mom do?'
name: Cynthia Nixon

quote: I think 'Family Guy' and 'American Dad' have definitely staked out their own style and territory, and now the accusations are coming that 'The Simpsons' is taking jokes from 'Family Guy.' And I can tell you, that ain't the case.
name: Matt Groening

quote: I grew up in the world of bad television, on my dad's sets and then as a young schmuck on dating shows and so on.
name: George Clooney

quote: My mum always told me I was precious, while my dad always told me I was worthless. I think that's a good grounding for a balanced life.
name: Alan Cumming

quote: I used to have a silk dressing gown an uncle bought in Japan and when I came downstairs in it, my dad used to call me Davinia. There was never embarrassment about that kind of thing. My sister used to dress me up a lot. She thought I was a little doll.
name: David Walliams

quote: I think it's easiest to teach by example. My dad didn't tell us to work hard we just saw how hard he worked. I know I have shortcomings - like a short fuse - but I've learned you can't come home from a long day of work and snap at the kids.
name: Chris O'Donnell

quote: I had lost relationships with my dad, my brother and sister and I was just like, you know what, this is definitely the time to just get it together and so that's what I did.
name: Nicole Richie

quote: You know, I'm just - I'm really happy for my dad.
name: Nicole Richie

quote: I had the opportunity to go to law school, and my dad, who was an accountant, couldn't believe I wanted to walk away from that and start cooking.
name: Curtis Stone

quote: Now that I'm a dad, I'm practicing what I call 'one- handed cooking,' because I've got something more important in my other arm. I'm whipping up lots of frittatas and omelets.
name: Curtis Stone

quote: My dad has been married to his wife for 15 years and wherever he goes there better be a seat for her. I like real couples that tell you how to get through on Wednesdays when you're just at the end of your rope - the ones who really know how to make it through. We have to stop looking at Hollywood couples because you're going to get disappointed.
name: Sherri Shepherd

quote: My sisters have been baptized and my dad is a deacon at his church now. Sadly my mother passed away but what I can say is that the Jehovah Witnesses took very good care of her up until she died.
name: Sherri Shepherd

quote: My dad worked two jobs and moved us to the suburbs, and just being a black person, I went through a lot of racism and being called names and being bullied every single day. And it was hard. I didn't have any friends.
name: Sherri Shepherd

quote: I listened to the radio, so I was influenced by everyone from Michael Jackson to Milli Vanilli. But thankfully my dad had a collection of Cat Stevens albums while my mom was listening to jazz.
name: Jason Mraz

quote: My dad has sometimes felt that I grew up a little lacking in sufficient eccentricity - in the sense that I'm willing to live as an adult in a house with walls that are parallel to each other, that sort of thing.
name: Jaron Lanier

quote: I was into all kinds of music as a teen - country music, because my dad was in a band that played country, and whatever my sister and brother were into.
name: Martina McBride

quote: My dad was a huge country music fan, but he also had a band and he sang. So he'd listen to a lot of music and the songs that he'd learn for the band were more from the male artists. So my earliest country memories were Waylon Jennings, Conway Twitty, George Jones, Johnny Paycheck even.
name: Martina McBride

quote: I never saw my dad cry. My son saw me cry. My dad never told me he loved me, and consequently I told Scott I loved him every other minute. The point is, I'll make less mistakes than my dad, my sons hopefully will make less mistakes than me, and their sons will make less mistakes than their dads.
name: James Caan

quote: Me and my dad are friends. We're cool. I'll never be disappointed again, because I don't expect anything anymore from him. I just let him exist, and that's how we get along.
name: Drake

quote: My dad's family were pretty working class, actually.
name: Dan Stevens

quote: My dad tells me that he took us to a pantomime when I was very, very small - panto being a sort of English phenomenon. There's traditionally a part of the show where they'll invite kids up on the stage to interact with the show. I was too young to remember this, but my dad says that I was running up onstage before they even asked us.
name: Dan Stevens

quote: My dad liked a lot of Motown, but I didn't listen to it until my teenage years.
name: John Legend

quote: I love my mom and dad.
name: Taylor Momsen

quote: The only time I ever look good dancing is if I'm next to my dad at a wedding.
name: Cat Deeley

quote: Mental illness can happen to anybody. You can be a dustman, a politician, a Tesco worker... anyone. It could be your dad, your brother or your aunt.
name: Frank Bruno

quote: There's a lot of research behind the scenes that you don't get to see, but I have an instinct that my dad nurtured from when I was born. I was very lucky then.
name: Steve Irwin

quote: I didn't have any role models really. My best friend was a dog. My mum and dad saved a dog from the gutter and that dog was my brother before Jesse was born. Sami was his name and he was my role model.
name: Ville Valo

quote: My dad used to draw these great cartoon figures. His dream was being a cartoonist, but he never achieved it, and it kind of broke my heart. I think part of my interest in art had to do with his yearning for something he could never have.
name: Kathryn Bigelow

quote: My grandfather had two boys, my uncle had three boys, my dad had me and my two brothers, each of my brothers have had two boys. Then something happened with the chromosomal experiment and suddenly I've got three girls.
name: Greg Kinnear

quote: My dad had this rock hard body and would work 12- to 13-hour days. The guys he worked with were scrap-iron guys. Nobody on that road crew had read a book in 10 years, but there was something about the way they lived I really admired.
name: Richard Russo

quote: A company that pays attention to the family unit is a successful company. We don't isolate the family. We don't make rides that say, 'Hey mom, dad, you go sit on the bench.'
name: Michael Eisner

quote: My dad was rubbish at all other aspects of his financial life, but he's pretty good at paying the rent.
name: Robert Carlyle

quote: I've always taken my love of children from my father. He was a children magnet. Suddenly, having my first child hit home what my dad went through.
name: Robert Carlyle

quote: My memories are of my dad taking me to football on Saturday mornings, and my mum taking me swimming. Those are the things I remember from my childhood, not sitting around the table debating capitalism and the profit squeeze.
name: David Miliband

quote: My dad was a ham, too. He could sell those women anything. Of all his sons, I was the only one he could trust to sell as well as he could. I was proud of that.
name: Paul Lynde

quote: Politicians... talk in generalities and lies, and I think they've caused all our grief. They're so awful, they're really funny. I hate thinking this because my dad loved politics.
name: Paul Lynde

quote: My mom's a social worker, and my dad works in non-profit organisations.
name: Seth Rogen

quote: After graduating from flares and platforms in the early 1970s, I started drama school wearing a pair of khaki dungarees with one of my Dad's Army shirts, accessorised by a cat's basket doubling as a handbag. Very Lady Gaga.
name: Jenny Eclair

quote: I've just got crap hair. Although I inherited a lot of stuff from my dad, including giant knees, I didn't get his good, thick hair. I got my mother's thin, wispy, non-event hair instead.
name: Jenny Eclair

quote: I was into the Mets because my Dad worked at IBM where he got free Mets tickets, so I was into the Mets... then I got to 'Saturday Night Live' where my boss has unbelievable N.Y. Yankees tickets, so he invites us to the games. I'm going to all the games, so I might as well root for the team I'm gonna go sit with.
name: Jimmy Fallon

quote: I always wanted to be a stay-at-home dad making art, making movies.
name: Robert Rodriguez

quote: In high school I dated a white woman. She would come to visit me on the rez. And her dad, who was very racist, didn't like that at all. And he told her one time, 'You shouldn't go on the rez if you're white because Indians have a lot of anger in their heart.'
name: Sherman Alexie

quote: When I was a kid, my step dad started this business and would go out and get lost cows and stuff. He was part-time truck driver, farmer and cowboy. He taught me how to ride from an early age.
name: Tim McGraw

quote: I haven't really decided to be an actor yet! I started doing plays when I was about 15 or 16. I only did it because my dad saw a bunch of pretty girls in a restaurant and he asked them where they came from and they said drama group. He said, 'Son, that is where you need to go.'
name: Robert Pattinson

quote: My dad says he likes to bask in my glow.
name: Robert Pattinson

quote: I grew up with baseball I played in Little League and went to games with my dad. But I, as I grew up, became more of a basketball fanatic than a baseball one.
name: Jonah Hill

quote: My mom was a professional. My dad and mom met each other in a movie called 'New Faces of 1937.' My mom went under the name Thelma Leeds, and she did a few movies, and she was really a great singer, and when she married my dad and started to have a family, she sang at parties.
name: Albert Brooks

quote: I love being a dad, it keeps me fit and inspired and children are so funny. They always supply you with acting material!
name: Wesley Snipes

quote: My first outdoor cooking memories are full of erratic British summers, Dad swearing at a barbecue that he couldn't put together, and eventually eating charred sausages, feeling brilliant.
name: Jamie Oliver

quote: I want any excuse to come home. My dad is not a spring chicken any more. If anyone says, 'Go buy a postage stamp in London,' I'll go and do it.
name: Emily Mortimer

quote: We all have experiences in our lives that change us, and we all learn from people, like my dad, but at the end of the day, it's only us. And we're only responsible to make ourselves happy.
name: Tom Brady

quote: I was born in 1968, just eighteen months after my sister Chrisse and just one year after Dad passed the bar exam.
name: Carre Otis

quote: My dad was an editor and a writer, and that's actually what I aspired to be.
name: Anne M. Mulcahy

quote: Baseball is the president tossing out the first ball of the season. And a scrubby schoolboy playing catch with his dad on a Mississippi farm.
name: Ernie Harwell

quote: I have great faith that Heaven's there and I'll see my brothers and my mom and dad when I get there.
name: Ernie Harwell

quote: When I was 7, my dad asked his friend to teach me. I played my first tournament competition when I was 8. I remember I shot around 125.
name: Yani Tseng

quote: If a dad does his job, we don't need prisons, we don't need jails. That's what I saw growing up.
name: Mike Singletary

quote: I've become a less brave traveller since I became a dad, but in the past I was more foolhardy than brave.
name: David Mitchell

quote: My dad was working abroad, in Iraq, and he was a doctor. We used to go and visit him, in Baghdad, off and on. For the first ten years of my life, we used to go backwards and forwards to Baghdad, so that was quite amazing. I spent a lot of time traveling around the Middle East.
name: Andy Serkis

quote: I stayed in Baghdad every summer until I was 14. My dad's sister is still there, but many of my relatives have managed to get out. People forget that there are still people there who are not radicalized in any particular direction, trying to live normal lives in a very difficult situation.
name: Andy Serkis

quote: My mom and dad got divorced when I was very young, and growing up in a family where the head of the household wasn't a man made a big difference.
