quote: I'm probably a little more like my dad. But because of my mom, I never saw being a woman as being an impediment to being able to do something. She had her Ph.D. before I was born.
name: Mary Cheney

quote: We always had lutefisk for Christmas dinner, after which Dad read from the Norwegian Bible.
name: Peter Agre

quote: Dad was a chemistry professor at Saint Olaf College in Minnesota, then Oxford College in Minnesota, and a very active member of the American Chemical Society education committee, where he sat on the committee with Linus Pauling, who had authored a very phenomenally important textbook of chemistry.
name: Peter Agre

quote: To those of you who are wearing ties, I think my dad would appreciate it if you took them off.
name: Robert Moog

quote: For my birthday this year, my girlfriends - who knew I'd just inherited my dad's turntable - gave me a carton of albums like 'Blue Kentucky Girl,' by Emmylou Harris, and 'Off the Wall,' by Michael Jackson. It's all stuff we grew up with. I mean, you can't have a music collection without Prince's 'Purple Rain' - it just can't be done!
name: Connie Britton

quote: We came from a family where we ran our own small business. Our dad made his own products. We made our own sausages, our own meatloafs, our own pickles. Dad had to do everything himself. He had to figure out how to finance his business.
name: Marcy Kaptur

quote: My dad keeps joking about sneaking into my grandparents' house and switching out their HBO for PBS so they think I'm on 'Downton Abbey.'
name: Allison Williams

quote: The best advice my dad ever gave me is that acting is believing. Acting is not acting. It isn't putting on a face and dancing around in a mask. It's believing that you are that character and playing him as if it were a normal day in the life of that character.
name: Haley Joel Osment

quote: My dad never told me that when you audition, you might not get the role. He wanted to wait until my first disappointment to tell me.
name: Haley Joel Osment

quote: I was really bright as a kid and tested well, and it was clear that I was going to get scholarships to any schools I wanted. My dad always said I could be an engineer at that time it was the elite of society: steady job, working in science, which was then the answer to every problem we had. It was kind of a mandate. Kind of a dream he had for me.
name: James Wood

quote: My parents loved each other. I was raised in a house of total love and respect. My dad worked very hard and my mother was incredibly devoted to him. I can unequivocally, without any peradventure of doubt, tell you that I was raised with the kind of love that we only dream of.
name: James Wood

quote: Dad is my best mate and I can tell Mum absolutely anything. I really appreciate Mum and Dad. Why are we so close? Young parents, I think. The rock business keeps their minds young.
name: Kim Wilde

quote: I wasn't aware of my dad being an actor when I was young. I remember there was an Australian children's entertainer on television called Ralph Harris and when I'd say my father was an actor, kids would say, you know, 'oh, is he Ralph Harris?' And I had to say no and then they would lose interest.
name: Jared Harris

quote: He described how, as a boy of 14, his dad had been down the mining pit, his uncle had been down the pit, his brother had been down the pit, and of course he would go down the pit.
name: Barbara Castle

quote: When my dad was badly weakened by the flu and my mom wanted to call an ambulance to take him to the emergency room, he wouldn't go unless he could shave first and change into a nice shirt and a pair of slacks.
name: Rich Lowry

quote: I'm probably going to get in trouble for this but 'American Dad' is one of my favourite shows. It gets very dark in places but the jokes are there.
name: Donald Glover

quote: My dad is this very sensible guy who never let me feel that anything was beyond my station.
name: Mireille Enos

quote: When I was little, I used to work with my dad on the engine of his car. Mostly this was a matter of me handing him wrenches.
name: Mireille Enos

quote: My dad is kind of a rascal, like in a Dickensian sense. He just goes from career to career.
name: Benjamin Walker

quote: My life isn't that dramatic. My dad really loves me, he just can't talk on the phone. He's too crippled and shy, and that's almost harder. He's there and he loves me, and I try and try and try, it's just impossible to have a relationship.
name: Joey Lauren Adams

quote: I don't deal with death very well. My brother, John Candy, my dad, my mom, Brandon Tartikoff just a couple of weeks ago. I mean, you lose a lot of people in your life, and that's one thing I am constantly working on - pain management.
name: James Belushi

quote: I don't know if there is a gene for comedy, but my dad was a very funny man. He just didn't know it. He was a naturally funny character, and when my brother and I would laugh at things he said and did, he would say, 'What do you think is so funny?'
name: James Belushi

quote: My dad was in the army so we moved around a lot and I changed schools every year and had to make new friends, and I found that if I was the funny guy I could do that easier.
name: Jason Gann

quote: I would say the most help I got was from my dad. My dad is a civil engineer in Switzerland he's 90 years old now, so he's no longer active as a civil engineer, but still a very active person.
name: Claude Nicollier

quote: My dad has no control over who works with me. Me, me and me alone has to take responsibility for anything.
name: Shane MacGowan

quote: Growing up, I had a front row seat to seeing two people work really hard. My dad scrubbed toilets at a private Catholic school for a while, and that was to help me get through school.
name: Mia Love

quote: My family was very supportive of whatever I wanted because my grandfather was an opera singer. My dad's dad. So my dad has an appreciation for the arts, and he let me choose my own path.
name: Tony Hale

quote: I always wanted to be a father. I have a beautiful relationship with my dad and beautiful memories. I always knew I was going to have a family.
name: Ricky Martin

quote: Every family is different. I am mom and I am dad and I'm going to do my best. You should be proud, walk through life saying I have the coolest family. I am part of a modern family.
name: Ricky Martin

quote: My dad served in two wars has been flying airplanes for 60 years now. He was certainly quite an inspiration.
name: John L. Phillips

quote: I remember my dad, who coached football, would buy some of his players football shoes when they couldn't afford it.
name: Chaske Spencer

quote: But Dad and I are the only father-and-daughter acts who have both had No. 1 songs in England.
name: Lily Allen

quote: My dad passed away before my freshman year, and it altered how I thought. I was depressed - I didn't hang out with my friends. I worked through it by dancing.
name: Heather Morris

quote: My goal is for Gunnar to outlive me. That's the way it should be. My dream is for him to be a dad himself one day, so he can find out all the anxiety that kids bring to their dads.
name: Boomer Esiason

quote: My dad and grandpa were in the army and as a country singer you're constantly playing at military bases all across the country and meeting soldiers and their families and hearing their stories.
name: Dierks Bentley

quote: My dad was my first coach and drove me extremely hard from a very young age.
name: Candace Parker

quote: From my first dunk at 14 years old to my second NCAA Championship at the University of Tennessee, my intense training with my dad was always to credit.
name: Candace Parker

quote: On my best days, such as when I was a junior in high school coming off a 42-point performance and near triple-double, my dad was there to tell me I haven't arrived yet and bring me back to reality.
name: Candace Parker

quote: I love playing a dad. It's hard to find family dramas that are genuinely funny.
name: Peter Gallagher

quote: If a cow walked into this room, I'd probably walk out. I could milk it, but my dad never forced me to do a lot of chores like that, mostly because he loved doing it himself.
name: Stuart Appleby

quote: My dad is a pilot so I think I was born with the travel bug.
name: Isabel Lucas

quote: I didn't really get into golf until I was about 14. My mom and dad were taking lessons from a pro an hour and a half from our farm in Cohuna, Australia. When they got home, I'd ask my mom to explain everything they learned - drills and all.
name: Stuart Appleby

quote: I had my footballing heroes such as Bryan Robson and Diego Maradona but my dad was a rugby league star, and he was my real hero. But the relationship with my mum was rocky and we saw things that would affect any youngster.
name: Ryan Giggs

quote: A mustache really defines your face. My dad had a mustache when I was growing up, and I can still remember when he shaved it, he looked like a completely different person.
name: Jason Sudeikis

quote: Some musicians I know are incredible fathers. Like Keith Richards. A fantastic dad.
name: Jack Bruce

quote: I love Prince Harry. Good looking and a bit of a rebel. Me and his dad are as thick as thieves and I knew Harry before I knew his dad so we've met a few times. I think he's amazing. And I think you can relate to him because he's made mistakes. He's cool.
name: Cheryl Cole

quote: We all have roles in life. I'm a dad, a husband, this and that, but basically I only feel justified in being alive when I'm on the stage.
name: Jack Bruce

quote: I have a weird sense of humour. My dad's the same. We love watching 'Monty Python' together.
name: Miranda Kerr

quote: My grandmother was an actress too. In the thirties and forties she was under contract with Universal Studios. Crazy credits, lots of them. My dad was also under contract with Universal Studios. And my first film was shot on the same stage they both worked on at Universal.
name: Chris Pine

quote: I got stuck up a tree when I was about seven, and my dad had to come and get the ladder to get me down. I loved to climb all the way up to the top. I must have been a koala in my past life.
name: Miranda Kerr

quote: No, like I said, my dad was never really part of the tennis. His involvement around what I did with the tennis and with my mom and my grandparents was really not a part of my life.
name: Jimmy Connors

quote: I've hung out at dozens of playgrounds, bored out of my mind, with not even a look of comfort from disapproving mothers all around me. Either they think I'm a pedophile or a deadbeat dad. That's what I get for being a single dad - suspicious looks at the playground.
name: Dominic West

quote: My mum's parents were from Ireland, my dad's mum was American-Irish.
name: Dominic West

quote: Obviously, losing a parent is very difficult. I miss my dad every day, but I know he would be proud to see me continuing to swim and going for another shot at the Olympics.
name: Eric Shanteau

quote: I actually study boxing - my dad was a Golden Gloves champion so I learned how to fight at a very young age. Growing up in Brooklyn you always had to watch your back, so I pretty much learned to protect myself.
name: Lana Parrilla

quote: I'd always assumed that I would die at about the same age as my dad - he was 45. I am five years in credit now. I can't get my head around the fact that I am older than he was - ever.
name: Ian Hislop

quote: I'm a four star general in this thing, and you don't rise to the ranks of a four star general by hanging about the house being the perfect dad.
name: Sam Elliott

quote: As I get older and I get a few more years experience I become more like Dad, you know, King Lear.
name: David Crystal

quote: One day when I was like 9, I heard the Beatles on the radio, and I asked my dad who they were. He told me they were the best band in the world, and I became obsessed. He started giving me their albums in sequential order, and I listened to them - and only them - until I was probably in high school.
name: Lukas Haas

quote: I think people like to think I'm in some way financially dependent on my family - on my dad - but the fact of the matter is I've been emancipated from my father since I was 14 years old. That's something people don't know or understand.
name: Devon Aoki

quote: My mom grew up in Kansas, my dad in Indiana. They had boring childhoods.
name: Hunter Parrish

quote: My mom was a dancer, my dad's a singer and I've always had that kind of music in my life.
name: Elvis Stojko

quote: From about eight years old I was always making things on the sewing machine. Friends would see me making dresses and costumes, and I'd use difficult fabrics such as Lycra and elastic. But you know, my dad was creative and my brother is inventive too.
name: Melissa George

quote: Mum and dad thought I was going to say I was pregnant. I said oh no, no, I've just been nominated for a Golden Globe. They were like, oh that's lovely, love.
name: Melissa George

quote: One of the accidental joys of my writing life has been that I've had some lovely, surprisingly good fortune with readers, and I've brought readers to my dad's work. I can't tell you the joy that gives me. Because my father's work was masterful.
name: Andre Dubus III

quote: Somewhere in my wildest childhood I must have done something right. Being able to make a boyhood dream come true is one thing, but to have a kid come along and thrill his dad like Brett Hull has thrilled me over his career is too much for one guy to handle.
name: Bobby Hull

quote: My dad and mom divorced when I was around ten, and I didn't live with him after that, though he was close by and we saw each other weekly. I wasn't really aware that he was a writer I didn't start reading his writing until I was about fifteen. It occurred to me then that my dad was kind of special he's still one of my favorite writers.
name: Andre Dubus III

quote: The most challenging part of being a dad is self-restraint. So often your instinct is to teach and tell. I am constantly reminding myself to listen to them.
name: Michael Chiklis

quote: I'm a dad now and whatever I'm doing in life I usually put a lot of effort into it - usually too much effort, so it kind of comes off ridiculous at times.
name: Jeremy Sisto

quote: I grew up in a big Irish, Catholic family. My dad was a pretty rough guy. So one of my brothers left home when he was 15 and found his way to the gym. It gave me the opportunity to go and spend some time with him and work out in the gym.
name: Gerry Cooney

quote: I know who my dad is, I've met him a few times, but I don't even call him dad. I know it sounds horrible, but I don't even see him as part of my family, to be honest. If you want the truth, it doesn't bother me because I don't know any different. I just know that me and my mum, that was my family.
name: Sally Pearson

quote: My folks have played everything from rock, disco, pop, funk, and blues. My dad has always brought and played different genres like jazz, classical, and Latin. With all this in my pocket, I feel I have a taste of everything for my influences.
name: Haley Reinhart

quote: I love my daughter, but she had me on couscous and fixed me pastas and made me eat oatmeal every morning and what else, turkey burgers, turkey bacon, and that kind of stuff. So she wants her dad to live a long time, and I do, too.
name: Dusty Baker

quote: It's always been a dream of mine to get somewhere and to have my mom and dad with me up there.
name: Haley Reinhart

quote: My dad wanted me to play when I was a kid, so I learned to play the guitar. I pursued a career in music because I love it so much and I enjoy what it does to those who hear it.
name: Randy Travis

quote: I needed to step away from music because the truth was I couldn't be the dad I wanted to be to my kids. My truth was that I could not reconcile the two worlds - the entertainment world and being the dad I wanted to be in the present. You can't substitute time, you just can't.
name: Corey Hart

quote: All my band members were old enough to be my dad. It was like this family vibe.
name: Hunter Hayes

quote: Truthfully, I'm still Corey Hart, Dad, first.
name: Corey Hart

quote: I think that every therapist that I know, including my dad and my sister, have their own issues. But that empathy is what makes them good at their job.
name: Laura Benanti

quote: Dad worked his entire career as an aviation technician. Mom was a legal secretary who became a teacher. We lived a simple American life.
name: Brian Sandoval

quote: My dad was good friends with the Bad Medicine Blues Band - one of the only blues bands in Fargo, as you can imagine! He took me out to see them play when I was 12 years old and I was really inspired by their guitar player, Ted Larsen.
name: Jonny Lang

quote: My dad was a good athlete. My mom had longevity. There were some athletic genes that certainly got passed down.
name: Hale Irwin

quote: I miss my Dad. My Dad loved cheesy monster movies, so we'd have Godzilla movie marathons. Those are some of my favorite memories, laughing at how the monster outfits were so bad, like black garbage bags for heads.
name: Ahmet Zappa

quote: I've always had an affinity for lawyers. My dad is a lawyer. He's retired now. My brother is a lawyer.
name: Scott Bakula

quote: Every dad who loves his daughter is not going to want her to go with the penniless slacker loser poet bum, when she could go out with someone who's successful.
name: John Leguizamo

quote: My dad died when I was three so my mom had to raise four kids on her own, and I think there's a part of me that pulls upon having watched my mom do that our whole lives. She had to make it work.
name: Leslie Bibb

quote: Usually a family is led through the mom or the dad and their career and for the family to be led by my career, even though God has led it, could be a lot of pressure.
name: Stacie Orrico

quote: No one was more important than my mom and dad. I know they are watching from a place up in heaven here today to make sure all their kids are doing good.
name: Eddie Murray

quote: My dad recently reminded me that my grandfather's cousin was Lefty Frizzell.
name: Parker Posey

quote: I was brought up in a car family, my dad loved cars and I was taught the art of making an Austin 7 operate.
name: Nick Mason

quote: My dad's an architect and my mom owned a French bakery for twelve years.
name: Alison Lohman

quote: My mum was very conscious about fashion and my dad was born into the tailoring tradition, so fashion has always been my life, although now, really, I wear the same thing - just in different weights - light and heavy cashmere in winter and cotton in summer.
name: Domenico Dolce

quote: I always told my dad I'd play professional football.
name: Anthony Doerr

quote: My dad doesn't like religion much, but I grew up very close to the Baptist tradition. God isn't this distant thing. God is right here with you all the time. He's your buddy, and you can talk about everything.
name: Lucy Alibar

quote: My dad was an inventor, and I think I've always had a rosy view of technology, or at least its potential.
name: Scott McCloud

quote: My dad, like many Southern men, is this very emotionally expressive person who isn't as articulate in words about his feelings as he is with breaking a chair or something like that.
name: Lucy Alibar

quote: My dad was an engineer and so I had this picture of science and technology and pursuits of the mind as being more impressive than artistic pursuits, which I saw a as kind of frivolous.
name: Scott McCloud

quote: I also turn down what's probably a good amount of coinage to be made out of playing dads, an incredible number of obnoxious dad.
name: Bill Pullman

quote: My mom and dad - they were always there. They were always on the set. They focused on our family life. The entertainment business wasn't the end-all. They weren't out to get the next big paycheck or the next big movie. It was about 'What can we do as a family.'
name: Candace Cameron Bure

quote: I lost my mother, who suffered from Alzheimer's disease, and we had to relocate my dad after 58 years in the family home. That was tough.
name: Doug Davidson

quote: You know that family is going to be there for you no matter what. My dad gave me a freakin' kidney!
name: Sarah Hyland

quote: I have mostly been terrified of listening to scary stories around a campfire. We camp a lot as a family, and at night my dad would try and tell us scary stories. This made eating s'mores difficult. The story would start with something like... 'and the old man who lived in these woods...' I would then run back into the camper terrified.
name: Willow Shields

quote: Everyone gets surprised because neither one of my parents play golf. Like I said in my speech, my aunt and uncle really love golf, and we visited them, and she gave me two clubs. Like people think when they don't know who my dad is, they think he's my coach.
name: Lydia Ko

quote: My sensei was a British karate champion named Brian Fitkin. He was my mentor and because I had a hard relationship with my dad, he became a father figure to me.
name: Dolph Lundgren

quote: To me I'm just a regular person going to the mall with friends, and now I'm in Forever 21 and I see this random group of girls staring at me and taking pictures. But now I usually have my dad, who is a really tall and intimidating person with me, so he's kind of my bodyguard.
name: Rebecca Black
